cause.description:
Women have been suffraging for much too long. This must stop immediately. Women can no longer go on like this. We are the only ones who can stop it and we must act quickly and with all our might, leaving no woman to suffrage ever again.
Peace
1. Women should not have to suffrage anymore
2. We are the only ones to stop the suffrage
3. We must prevent the suffrage from ever happening again
cause.mission: Stop the horrible Suffraging of women
cause.name: Stop the Suffrage
